page.title: 14A Country Walk
page.content: Yesterday we went on a country walk around Chelsfield Village.We set off from school,crossed {Buck's Cross Road} passed the {Old Post Office} and over to the Village Hall and the playing fields.We crossed over the cricket pitch and walked into the fields on the other side.We saw all sorts of wild flowers such as Cow Parsley on one side and the village allotments on the other.We climbed over a stile passed a hawthorn bush and came to some farmland where rows of strawberries had been planted. This was {Hewitts Farm} where they sell their fruit and produce to the public. We also came across an orchard of plum trees and some unripe apple trees.Besides the fruit we saw two goat,two donkeys and some geese on a pond.There was also a big black bull in a field close by.
